mapper.insert:
insert into cl_reseller_recharge_log_realtime_info (reseller_from_log_id,reseller_to_log_id, uid,reseller_receiver, reseller_code,`time`,dt,reseller_gold, country,short_id,area,created_at,updated_at) value(#{reseller_from_log_id},#{reseller_to_log_id} ,#{uid},#{reseller_receiver}, #{reseller_code},#{time},#{dt},#{reseller_gold}, #{country},#{short_id},#{area},#{created_at},#{updated_at}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
updated_at = #{updated_at}
